question: A lot of beads were discovered from Mohenjo-Daro in Indus Valley Civilization. Most of these beads were made of __?
explanation: The beautiful beads are one of the important discoveries of Mohenjodaro. Majority of the beads are made of fired steatite. Other materials in making beads include Agate, Carnelian, Lapis Lazuli, grossular garnet, serpentine and amazonite.
